summary: The Kroflus like cold climates.They LOVE skyrim.They are ready to vanquish those who stand against them.Tehy are looking to YOU to help them.
descriptionHtml:
The Kroflus are tall,strong people who live near Orsinium high in the mountains where normal humans would perish from the cold.They are excellent warriors in heavy armor and are sought after as heavily armoured mercenaries.They install fear in the hearts of their enemies and can berserk when they are very angry.

This mod is lore-friendly and isnt owerpowered.I am open to suggestions.You can write them in the comments section.Enjoy!
author: efe1804
